"I was hoping you could tell me what these attacks are about," Phobia 
knew what it was about he just didn't know why. "If you check with 
Kluster you will see that I have an agreement with him." the truth 
was the best policy at this point, at least it was the most 
convenient. "I told him I'd get some assistance to destroy a ship 
called the Iron Fist, I can't do that if these idiots keep damaging 
those reinforcements now can I?" Phobia didn't like having a maximal 
on board, especially one with hightened senses. 

"Take this back to the Cybertronian Fire and give it to Kluster." he 
held out a data crystal with information on the predacon cave and the 
predacons living there. "Tell him to control these Maximals or we are 
all doomed." There was an edge of desperation in his voice. "Now if 
you'd be so kind as to be on your way I won't fire on your friends 
out there." The spiderbot knew that  If he could get Kluster to step 
in he wouldn't have to worry about any more Predacon deaths. From 
what he knew about the Iron Fist they'd need every bit of firepower 
they could find.

OOC sorry so long but I gotta go now, I'll be on to dish out more 
abuse tomorrow.
